Text: Great! Rick Simpson must be heard!!! If you can, buy the book, it's only $9,99! Support the cause! http://phoenixtears.ca/buy-phoenixtears-the-rick-simpson-story/
That's exactly my thought! Rick needs to be heard! And if you can spare the money, give them some support!

Just finished reading this book. What an AMAZING eye-opener!!
If you haven't done so already, buy this book! I did and I'm proud of it. They really need our support!
It's these people that will definitely change the world for the better.
Also, even if you're not buying it, spread it. Get this message out to as many people as you can. Greed and corruption need to be exposed!
